Agnes Binagwaho bụ dibia bekee nke Rwanda na ugbua osote onye isi oche nke Mahadum Global Health Equity

Na 1996, ọ laghachiri na Rwanda ebe ọ na-enye nlekọta ahụike na mkpaghara ọha yana jidekwa ọtụtụ njikwa ọrụ, usoro ahụike ike, na ọkwa gọọmentị, gụnyere odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide nke Ministry of Health of Rwanda site na Octoba 2008 ruo Mee 2011 na Minista Ahụike site na Mee 2011 ruo Julaị 2016
Kemgbe 2016, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka Prọfesọ nke omume nke nnyefe ahụike zuru ụwa ọnụ na kemgbe 2017 dị ka Prọfesọ nke Pediatrics na Mahadum nke Global Health Equity na UGHE's Vice Chancellor
O bi ugbu a na Kigali
A mụrụ Binagwaho na Nyamagabe, Southern Province, Rwanda
Mgbe ọ dị afọ atọ, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara Belgium ebe nna ya na-agụcha akara mmụta ahụike ya
Ọ gụchara nzere ahụike ya (MD) na ọgwụ izugbe na Université libre de Bruxelles site na 1976-1984 na nzere nna ya ukwu na pediatrics (MA) na Université de Bretagne Occidentale site na 1989-1993
N'afọ 2010, e nyere ya Dọkịta Sayensị nsọpụrụ sitere na kọleji Dartmouth dị na United States
Na 2014, ọ ghọrọ onye mbụ enwetara Doctorate nke Philosophy (PhD) site na kọleji nke Medicine na Sciences ahụike na Mahadum Rwanda
Akpọrọ akwụkwọ nzere PhD ya, "Ikike ụmụaka nwere ahụike n'ihe gbasara ọrịa HIV: Okwu Rwanda"
Binagwaho nwetara Asambodo ọgwụgwọ ebe okpomọkụ sitere na Institute of Tropical Medicine Antwerp, Belgium, n'etiti 1984 na 1985

Na Université de Bretagne Occidentale, ọ dechara akwụkwọ atọ: Asambodo na Axiology (General Emergencies) (1991-1992); Asambodo na Mberede Ụmụaka (1992-1993); na asambodo na nlekọta na ọgwụgwọ ndị ọrịa HIV (1994-1995)
Ọ laghachiri Rwanda na Julaị 1996, afọ abụọ mgbe mgbuchapụ 1994 gasịrị megide ndị Tutsi

Site na Julaị ruo Ọgọst 1997, ọ gụchara mmemme ọzụzụ na mgbochi ọrịa AIDS na ọmụmụ onyunyo na Kigali site na World AIDS Foundation, nke Mahadum New Mexico uloakwukwo nke ogwu ahuike na siensi etiti kwadorooro

Site na Nọvemba 2009 ruo Eprel 2010, ọ dechara asambodo na Health and Human Rights - Dimensions and Strategies with InWent - Capacity Building International (Internationale Weiterbildung und Entwicklung gGmbH)  E nyekwara ya nzere Social and Behavioral Research Investigators Certificate site na US
Ụlọ ọrụ dabeere na Citi Collaborative Institutional Training Initiative
Binagwaho malitere usoro ọgwụgwọ ya na Belgium na France, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ mmụta ahụike
Ọ bụ ọkachamara n'ịgwọ ụmụaka, mgbe ọ nwetasịrị nzere nna ya ukwu n'ihe gbasara ụmụaka, ọ rụpụtara ngalaba na ọgwụgwọ mberede maka ndị okenye na ụmụaka, na ọgwụgwọ HIV/AIDS na ụmụaka na ndị okenye
Ọ rụsiri ọrụ ike na neonatology na, mgbe ọ laghachiri Rwanda na 1996, ọ jere ozi ụlọ ọgwụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ọha.
